sections.text:
79-1091.School district; fiscal year.

The fiscal year of each school district shall commence on September 1 in each year and end on August 31 of each year.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 706, ยง 1, p. 2708;R.S.1943, (1994), ยง 79-810.01;Laws 1996, LB 900, ยง 737.

Cross ReferencesFiscal year for purposes of the Special Education Act, see section 79-1143.
